bibl.title: A Petition to the Royal Scribe Horos of the Arsinoite Nome (P. Mich. Inv. 6956).
bibl.note: Petition (with Demotic docket) of Agathokles son of Menon, concerning an official, Metrodoros, who apparently had either tried to collect, or ordered collection of, certain payments allegedly owed by Agathokles for crown land. Oxyrhyncha (Arsinoites), 214/213 B.C.
FORSELV Inger Louise, A Petition to the Royal Scribe Horos of the Arsinoite Nome (P. Mich. Inv. 6956).
